itemInfo.itemDesc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: Thereâ€™s a small chance of acquiring it from Rocks.

item.name: Silver Embroidered Fisher's Clothes
item.desc: A noble outfit made for Fishers.

item.name: Ultimate Saiyer Ornamental Knot
item.desc: Saiyer Ornamental Knot developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Saiyer Ornamental Knot of Crimson Flame, Saiyer Ornamental Knot of Destruction, Saiyer Ornamental Knot of Temptation, Saiyer Ornamental Knot

item.name: Saiyer Ornamental Knot of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Saiyer Ornamental Knot.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Saiyer Ornamental Knot of Temptation, Saiyer Ornamental Knot

item.name: Saiyer Ornamental Knot of Destruction
item.desc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Saiyer Ornamental Knot.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Saiyer Ornamental Knot of Destruction, Saiyer Ornamental Knot

item.name: Saiyer Ornamental Knot of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Saiyer Ornamental Knot.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Saiyer Ornamental Knot of Crimson Flame, Saiyer Ornamental Knot

item.name: Saiyer Ornamental Knot
item.desc: A handmade ornamental knot for an axe made of quality silk.
